headline: Gartner (IT): Assessing Valuation After High-Profile Recognitions and New Industry Research Releases
summary: Gartner (NYSE:IT) has recently been at the center of industry attention, following a surge in recognitions and research publications across its Magic Quadrant, Hype Cycle, and analyst commentary series. These developments have placed a fresh spotlight on the company's influence over enterprise technology trends and vendor positioning. See our latest analysis for Gartner. Gartner's steady stream of high-profile research and vendor recognitions has kept it in the technology spotlight, yet the...
